Name: Elara Moonshadow
PersonalityTraits: I see omens in every event and action. The gods try to speak to us, we just need to listen. I quote sacred texts and proverbs in almost every situation, sometimes to the annoyance of others.
Ideals: Charity. I always try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost.
Bonds: I owe my life to the priest who took me in when my parents died. I will protect the common people from the tyranny of evil.
Flaws: I am inflexible in my thinking. Once I make up my mind, nothing can change it. I trust that my deity will guide my actions; I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well.
Backstory: Elara was orphaned as a child when her human father and elven mother were killed during a bandit raid on their village. She was taken in by a kindly priest of Selûne at a nearby temple, where she discovered her calling to serve the Moonmaiden. For twenty years she studied the healing arts and learned to channel divine magic. When rumors of a darkness spreading through the Sword Coast reached the temple, Elara felt Selûne's call to venture forth and bring light to those in shadow. She carries her adoptive father's silver holy symbol and prays each night that her actions honor both her departed parents and her divine patron.
